myServiceDescription: Are you looking for a talented junior front-end developer to bring your website to life? Look no further! As a junior front-end developer, I specialize in creating visually stunning and user-friendly websites that are optimized for performance and accessibility.

services.title: HTML/CSS Development
services.description: Have a strong foundation in HTML and CSS, allowing me to build clean and semantic code.

services.title: Responsive Design
services.description: Create websites that look great on all devices, from desktops to smartphones.

services.title: JavaScript
services.description: I am proficient in JavaScript and can add interactivity and dynamic features to your website.

services.title: Performance Optimization
services.description: I optimize your website to load quickly and efficiently, providing a seamless user experience.

services.title: Cross-Browser Compatibility
services.description: I ensure that your website works flawlessly across all major web browsers.

services.title: Accessibility
services.description: I follow best practices to ensure that your website is accessible to all users, including those with disabilities.

education.additional: In GeoLab we teach the students how to create and organize dynamic websites. A dynamic website is saved on a web server in a form of scripts, templates and other data. Such website is located on a server as separate components.

items.title: Html/Css
items.description: GeoLab - is a mobile and web applications laboratory. This space is open 24 hours for different, interesting and innovative projects. The training center is an indivisible part of GeoLab, which provides various directions to match anyone’s sphere of interest.
